'''''A Well-Trained Archaeologist''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to find all 10 [[Primal Obelisk]]s in the [[Hypostyle Desert]], [[Land of Upper Setekh]], and [[Land of Lower Setekh]] and restore with [[Sacred Seal]]s.
